name: MEC Trailboost Merino Crew Socks - Women's
description: Your tired feet deserve a boost of comfort and performance. These midweight cushioned socks use a nylon, merino blend to keep your feet dry and comfy on short hikes or long backpacking trips.Nylon, merino wool and spandex wick moisture to keep your feet comfortable.Merino wool is naturally antimicrobial and keeps your feet warm in the cold and cool in the warmth.Anti-slip leg and seamless construction ensure no bunching or blisters.Cushioned toe and heel keep you going kilometre after kilometre.
